price: Na sikiliza siku atapo nadi mwenye kunadi kutoka pahala karibu.
arabic: وَٱسۡتَمِعۡ يَوۡمَ يُنَادِ ٱلۡمُنَادِ مِن مَّكَانٖ قَرِيبٖ
footnotes: Na sikiliza khabari ninazo kwambia katika hadithi za Kiyama kwani shani yake ni kubwa. Siku atapo nadi Malaika wa kunadi kutoka pahala pa karibu na hao wanao itwa.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wa-is'tamiʿ yawma yunādi al-munādi min makānin qarībin
